snippet: A home run by Bill Skowron for the Yankees in 1962 was a memorable moment for one fan because it was his first time inside Yankee Stadium.
abstract: Box Seats column by sports journalist Malcolm Moran remembers former New York Yankees first baseman Bill Skowron, after his death in April at age 81.
lead_paragraph: A home run by Bill Skowron for the Yankees in 1962 was a memorable moment for one fan because it was his first time inside Yankee Stadium.

headline.seo: An Aging Yankees Fan and Moose Skowron: First Game, Forever Memory
headline.main: Skowron Had a Knack for Making Memories
headline.print_headline: Skowron Had a Knack For Making Memories
